actions.text: Amendment SA 597 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 75.

Amendment SA 597 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Scott. (consideration: CR S2292-2296; text: CR S2292) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the prohibition of taxpayer dollars and resources being used to automatically deduct union dues from the pay of Federal employees.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 597 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 75.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 597 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 75.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 597 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Scott.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the prohibition of taxpayer dollars and resources being used to automatically deduct union dues from the pay of Federal employees.
